name: PSQL Insert Member
resp
Prepare SQL Query
func:
const member_id = msg.req.params.member_id;

// Prepare SQL to get the member without the password
msg.query = `
    SELECT 
        member_id, 
        member_firstname, 
        member_lastname, 
        member_picture, 
        member_languages, 
        member_summary, 
        team_id, 
        country_id, 
        member_status, 
        member_level, 
        skill_id, 
        creation_date
    FROM 
        members
    WHERE 
        member_id = $1
`;

msg.params = [member_id];

return msg;

name: Format Response
Prepare SQL Insert
Create Response
Prepare SQL Query
Format Response
Prepare SQL Query
func:
// Extract query parameters
const skip = parseInt(msg.req.query.skip) || 0;  // Default to 0 if not provided
const limit = parseInt(msg.req.query.limit) || 50;  // Default to 50 if not provided

// Validate skip and limit
if (isNaN(skip) || skip < 0) {
    node.error('Invalid skip parameter', msg);
    return null;
}

if (isNaN(limit) || limit <= 0) {
    node.error('Invalid limit parameter', msg);
    return null;
}

msg.query = `SELECT 
    a.activity_id,
    a.activity_name,
    a.activity_desc,
    a.activity_xp,
    a.activity_credit,
    a.activity_type,
    a.activity_startdate,
    a.activity_enddate,
    a.activity_qr,
    a.creation_date,
    json_build_object('org_id', o.org_id, 'org_name', o.org_name) AS activity_org,
    json_build_object('member_id', m.member_id, 'member_firstname', m.member_firstname, 'member_lastname', m.member_lastname) AS activity_owner,
    array_agg(json_build_object('skill_id', s.skill_id, 'skill_name', s.skill_name)) AS skills
FROM 
    activities a
LEFT JOIN 
    organizations o ON a.activity_org = o.org_id
LEFT JOIN 
    members m ON a.activity_owner = m.member_id
LEFT JOIN 
    activity_skills act_s ON a.activity_id = act_s.activity_id
LEFT JOIN 
    skills s ON act_s.skill_id = s.skill_id
GROUP BY 
    a.activity_id, o.org_id, m.member_id
ORDER BY 
    a.activity_name
LIMIT $1 OFFSET $2;`

msg.params = [
    limit,
    skip
];
return msg;

func:
const member_id = msg.req.params.member_id;


// Prepare SQL
msg.query = `
    UPDATE members 
    SET
        member_firstname = $1, 
        member_lastname = $2, 
        member_picture = NULL,
        member_languages = NULL, 
        member_summary = NULL, 
        country_id = NULL, 
        skill_id = NULL,
        member_credit = NULL,
        member_xp = NULL,
        member_level = NULL,
        member_status = $3
    WHERE member_id = $4
    RETURNING *;
`;

msg.params = ["deleted", "member", "deleted", member_id];

return msg;
